title: Patient Testimonials
subtitle: What our patients say about their experience with Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center

testimonials.quote: Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center ma paeko sewa ati uttam thiyo. Doctors haru le mero samasya dhyan diyera sunnu bhayo ra malai aawashyak upchar ko lagi yogya yojana banaunubhayo.
testimonials.name: Raj Kumar Shrestha

testimonials.quote: Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center ko staff haru professional matra hoina, ati nai dayalu pani chan. Uniharu le mero pariwar ko lagi tanawpurna awastha lai sajilo banaidinu bhayo.
testimonials.name: Anjali Sharma

testimonials.quote: Ma dherai barsha dekhi Purna Chandra Diagnostic Center ma aaudai chu ra sadhai uttam sewa paeko chu. Naya telemedicine ko subidha le mero swasthya herchah garna ajhai sajilo banaeko cha.
testimonials.name: Krishna Prasad Adhikari

testimonials.quote: Pediatric team le mero chori ko ramro herchah garnubhayo. Uniharu le uslai comfortable feel garaunu bhayo ra sabai kura ustari bujhaunu bhayo jasle garda usko dar kam bhayo.
testimonials.name: Sarita Tamang

testimonials.quote: Dubai ma kaam garne visa ko lagi aawashyak medical checkup ko lagi ma yeha aayeko thiye. Sabai test haru professional tarika le chito ra sajilo garaidiyo, jasle garda mero visa process sajilo bhayo.
testimonials.name: Deepak Gurung
